AuthFilter - a servlet filter to ensure authenticated user info is put at request scope properly

Method Detail

setAuthenticationService

protected void setAuthenticationService(AuthenticationService service)
This method is intended for testing purposes only so that a fake, mock, ect. service can be used. This method should not be used to change the service implementation used. That is the responsibility of AuthenticationServiceFactory.

Parameters:
service - An AuthenticationService to use for testing.
See Also:
AuthenticationServiceFactory
